name: ABOT: An aBundance of Tables
title: ABOT: An aBundance of Tables
description: Crush that decision paralysis! A collection of rolling tables for making both mechanical choices (Race+Subrace, Class+Subclass, Background, Feats) and personality choices (assigned gender, gender identity, romantic/sexual orientation, alignment) -- for when you're on a time crunch or just don't know where to start!
